author: Vijaita Singh
text:
Arunachal Pradesh Governor J.P. Rajkhowa, in a four-page report to President Pranab Mukherjee on January 15, said: “The law and order situation has been deteriorating every passing day, and there was a total collapse of the law and order machinery on December 15, 16 and 17 in particular when no semblance of State government was seen. Only anarchical situation prevailed.”

“I was abused, scolded by threatening words, even attempted to be physically assaulted and Ministers tried to physically restrain me. I was rescued by my alert staff on December 15,” said the report.
title: I was abused and restrained: Governor
